title: Online Educational Module for Improving Palliative Care Awareness

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Knowledge in Medical/Legal/Technical Fields; No Understanding of Palliative Care
context.additional_context: Learners access online modules in offline classroom settings using personal devices (BYOD) and measure learning outcomes through project-based assessments. Learners from diverse professional backgrounds collaborate to explore the societal significance of palliative care awareness diffusion.

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts of palliative care (physical, emotional, social, and spiritual support) with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can analyze the experiences of actual palliative care recipients (patients and families) and compare treatment effectiveness across three case studies.
Learners can design and present one practical strategy (e.g., campaign, educational materials) to improve palliative care awareness through team projects.

resources: Online educational modules (videos, interviews, interactive content)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
